item.title: Test Two
item.description: This second test page! What does inline formatting look like? Does it look good? Let’s check. Here is a filename.txt. And here is anotherOne.css. Here’s one that’s also-a-link.html There we go, that’s better. {{ range .Pages }} <div class="section__item"> <div class="section__item-head"> <h4><a href="{{ .RelPermalink }}">{{ .Title }}</a></h4> <p class="section__item-period">{{ .Date.Format "Jan 2, 2006" }}</p> </div> <div class="section__item-content"> <div> <p class="section__item-description">{{ .Summary }}</p> <a href="{{ .RelPermalink }}" class="section__view-all">Read More ‚Üí</a> </div> </div> </div> {{ else }} <p>No posts found.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Software Engineer from Aotearoa New Zealand. I’ve recently moved to Montr√©al, Canada üçÅ having spent the past 5 years working for Trade Me in NZ. I’m passionate, friendly, and excited about building interesting systems that solve important problems. I’m currently learning French and spending a bit more time tinkering in small open source projects. In my spare time I play guitar and ski. I like podcasts, Studio Ghibli movies and making silly things in code for fun.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Work Senior Full Stack Developer ‚Ä¢ Trade Me 2019 - 2025 Trade Me is New Zealand’s largest online marketplace, and 5th most visited website. My final role was working in the Marketplace team, building features for high-volume sellers. AngularTypeScriptSCSS.NETC#ElasticSearchGoogle CloudGitLab Data Analyst ‚Ä¢ CCS Disability Action 2018 - 2019 Node.jsJavaScriptMongoDB Developer Intern ‚Ä¢ Snapper 2016 - 2017 AndroidJavaAWS Education BSc in Computer Science ‚Ä¢ Victoria University of Wellington 2016 - 2019

item.title: Now
item.description: I’m living in Canada now. This really is just a test to create this page.

item.title: People I Admire
item.description: Globally People from around the world who’s work I admire. For the most part, a mix of software development, data viz and design. Sarah Drasner Tom Macwright Maggie Appleton Dan Abramov Amelia Wattenberger Josh Comeau Stephanie Tuerk Evan Peck From New Zealand Sam Jarman Amir Mohtasebi Nate Watson Aaron Schiff Peers People I’ve worked with / know IRL. Maz Hermon Will Hardwick-Smith Luke Mansell Will Richardson Josh Richards Daisy Rendell Nick Webster Simon Merrick Cam Bryers Andre Westerlund Josh Lowe People who just have cool websites I used them as reference for this one!
